query: I need to set an alarm for 10:30 PM every Sunday to remember to prepare for next week's work.
explanation: This intent sets a recurring alarm at 10:30 PM on Sundays to remind the user to prepare for the upcoming work week.

query: Please remind me at 3:15 PM today to call the doctor.
explanation: This intent sets a one-time alarm for 3:15 PM today to remind the user to call the doctor.

query: Can you set an alarm for every weekday at 8:00 AM so I don’t oversleep?
explanation: This intent creates a recurring alarm for 8:00 AM from Tuesday to Saturday to help the user wake up on weekdays.

explanation: This intent sets a recurring alarm for 2:00 PM on Saturdays to remind the user of their online class.

explanation: This intent sets a one-time alarm for 9:30 AM that uses a specific ringtone to alert the user for their job interview.

explanation: This intent sets a monthly recurring alarm on the 1st of each month at 12:00 PM to remind the user to pay their rent.
